eyin 196 denek parlimenthu mathiwaranayenda ithiri 29 dena maha mathiwaranaye di ek ek pakshaya laba gath chanda anupathayata anuwa jathika layisthuwen da path kerethi.chanda dayakayo 1,40,88,500k chandaya pawichchi kirimata sudusukam laba sitithi.ada ude 7.00 sita paswaru 4.00 dakwa madhyasthana 11155kadi mathiwaranaya pawathwe.chanda ganan kirima madhyasthana 1387kadi ada rathriye aarambha wimata niyamithaya.

tharaka wikramasekaraanuradhapura disthrikkaye pasal sisun prawahanaya karanu labana pasal bas ratha ha pasal wan rathawalin 75% kma dhawanayata nusudusu thaththwaye pawathina bawa anuradhapura motar ratha adhikshana niladhari di.es.bi. disanayaka mahatha pawasayi.dayata kirulata samagamiwa motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa wisin karanu labana karyayange ek piyawarak lesa mema sodisiya polisiye da sahayen sidu karanu labu athara ehidi wahana 15 kma kisidu aakarayaka dhawana thaththwayaka nothibuna athara wahana 12 kata thahanam niyoga laba di aththe awashya wishala aluthwadiyawan sidukara yali dhawanayata ekkarana lesayi.thawath wahana 20 kata pamana thahanam niyoga labadi aththe ema wahanawala adupadu sakas kara yali dhawanayata ekkarana lesayi.dhawanayata sudusu thaththwaye wahana thibi aththe 25% k pamana sankhyawak bawada disanayaka mahatha kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

ee anuwa singappuru welanda pole brent wargaye borathel baralayaka mila a.do. 65 k wa thibiyadi 2019 sapthambar masa awasan warata mila suthrayata anuwa thel mila pahatha paridi sanshodhanaya karana ladi. 2019 sapthambar masayata sapekshawa 2020 marthu wana wita thibiya yuthu thel mila ada wana wita enam 2020 marthu masa 07 wanada wana wita loka welanda pole borathel mila 30 % tath wada adu pramanayakin adu wi atha. 2019 sapthamber masa a.do. 65 sita ada wana wita a.do 45 dakwa brent wargaye thel baralayaka mila behewin adu wi atha.
